verses.text: Let us sing unto the Lord, for he is gloriously glorified; the horse and the rider he hath cast into the sea.
Give ear, O heavens, and I will speak; and hear, O earth, the words of my mouth.
For a fire is kindled in mine anger, and shall burn unto the lowest hell.
My heart is established in the Lord, and my horn is exalted in my God.
From the night-season my spirit awaketh early unto thee, O God, for thy commandments are a light upon the earth.
Lord, I have heard thy report, and was afraid: O Lord, I revived thy work in the midst of the years.
I said in the cutting off of my days, I shall go to the gates of the grave.
I said, I shall not see the Lord, even the Lord, in the land of the living.
I cried by reason of mine affliction unto the Lord, and he heard me.
Blessed art thou, O Lord God of our fathers: thy name is worthy to be praised and glorified for evermore.

chapters.title: Song of the Three Holy Children

verses.text: O all ye works of the Lord, bless ye the Lord: praise him, and magnify him for ever.
My soul doth magnify the Lord, and my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Savior.
Blessed be the Lord God of Israel; for he hath visited and redeemed his people.
Lord, now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace, according to thy word.
